summary: This code is installing the "pybgs" package using pip, after setting the OpenCV_DIR environment variable. It then performs a build and installation of the package in the "bgslibrary" directory. The PATH variable is updated to include relevant directories for proper execution.

details.comment: This code is installing the "pybgs" package using pip, after setting the OpenCV_DIR environment variable. It then performs a build and installation of the package in the "bgslibrary" directory. The PATH variable is updated to include relevant directories for proper execution.
details.content:
# opencvdir=""
# env OpenCV_DIR= pip3 install pybgs
export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games:/usr/local/cuda-10.2/bin:/snap/bin
cd bgslibrary
python3 setup.py build
python3 setup.py install
